title: Dominic Raab – 2021 Statement on the UN’s Durban Conference
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Dominic Raab, the Foreign Secretary, on 21 June 2021.
content:
Following historic concerns regarding antisemitism, the UK has decided not to attend the UN’s Durban Conference anniversary event, later this year.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
